title: Icebreakers
brief_description: This video is aimed at anyone involved with presenting at meetings, seminars, running a course or a workshop and working with small groups of people who don’t know each other that well or who don’t know each other at all. Icebreakers are fundamental in any successful delivery and this program provides a look at eight icebreakers that can be used in a variety of situations. Includes a Training Manual.
